body.name: Ecovita 100% Compostable Knives - 140 Large Disposable Utensils (7 in.) Eco Friendly Durable and Heat Resistant Alternative to Plastic Knives with Convenient Tray
body.couponInfo: Save an extra $2 on your first Subscribe and Save order.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs
features: ✔️ ECO FRIENDLY TESTED / BPI CERTIFIED 100% COMPOSTABLE - Our eco cutlery set is certified by Biodegradable Product Institute and TUV which complies with USA and European ASTM D6400 & EN13432 High Standards. Ensure environmental friendliness by accepting no lower standard than BPI Certified Compostable Utensils made from Renewable and Sustainable Plant Resources - ZERO WASTE. ZERO GUILT. All contents including recyclable packaging are PLASTIC FREE!

✔️ ALL NATURAL PLANT BASED / ALL SAFE - Enjoy your food with Non-GMO Corn Based Cutlery made in a registered facility. This renewable resource (corn) is grown and harvested ethically right here in the USA. No BPA, Chlorine or Toxic Chemicals that may be found in disposable plastic utensils. No Risk of Splinters or Popsicle after taste while eating or tasting like with Wooden Utensils.

✔️ 60 DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - We believe you will be totally satisfied by our safe, environmentally friendly tableware. Perfect for Camping, Picnics, Lunches, Catering, BBQs, Party, Wedding and Restaurants. If not, we will gladly give you a full refund! Proudly based in San Diego, CA.

✔️ EXTRA LONG UTENSILS WITH RECYCLABLE CONVENIENT TRAY - No more having to fumble with small disposable utensils. Our large 7.1 in. compostable knives (140) allow for a firm grip while cutting through steak or hard fruit. We also provide a complementary recyclable tray for easy storing and displaying at parties or events.

✔️ STURDY WITH PREMIUM FEEL AND HIGH HEAT RESISTANCE - Our unique high-heat and high-pressure process creates disposable eco friendly knives with a premium matte finish designed to be durable and hot food friendly up to 212 °F! They give you that unmatched high quality feel without absorbing hot liquids or softening like disposable wooden cutlery. TREE FREE means you don’t have to cut one down to provide elegantly durable utensils. Can even take a beating in the dishwasher.
body.description: WHY BPI CERTIFIED PRODUCTS MAKE A DIFFERENCE Guide to Setting up an Eco Event Included (Insert) BPI Certified tableware under the appropriate conditions will turn into nutrient-rich soil in an industrial or composting facility in 2 - 4 months, not 100 years like single-use plastic! In addition, BPI certified flatware (made of CPLA) takes 65% less energy to make and produces 68% fewer greenhouse gases than conventional plastics. Look for environmentally conscious utensils certified by BPI (Certificate #10528852 Issued 2018) meeting high standards (ASTM D6400). Eco Tested | 100% BPI Certified All Natural and Safe Large Sturdy Utensils With High Heat Resistance Convenient Tray Included Guide to Setting Up Eco Event Included (See Insert)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: STRIVING TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE Zero Waste & Sustainable Our products are 100% Compostable and take less energy to make and produces fewer greenhouse gases than conventional plastics. They comply with ASTM D6400 & EN13432 Strict Standards and have been awarded BPI certification, gold standard in compostability. All Natural & Safe Our products are manufactured in registered facilities. We use all natural plant resources like Non-GMO corn grown and harvested in the USA. No BPA, Chlorine or Toxic Chemicals that may be found in Plastic. We only source from the best manufacturers with high standing and quality. Elegantly Durable We have created these products to be sturdy for everyday use but beautiful and minimalistic designed for your special events and activities. They have undergone a special process which converts the natural raw material into a design with increased durability and heat resistance without compromising our Planet. We Donate to Positive Causes In addition, to the positive impact our products have, we pledge 5% of profits to organizations or programs that make a Positive Impact in our Communities and Planet. We are commitment to making a change that will help keep our ocean, air and land clean and beautiful. Together we can make a difference.

Ecovita provides premium eco conscious products and peace of mind that you are providing all-natural plant-based tableware for your family and friends. Perfect for Camping, Picnics, Lunches, Catering, BBQs, Events, Parties, Weddings and Restaurants. We believe you will be totally satisfied by our safe, plant-based products. WHY BPI CERTIFIED PRODUCTS MAKE A DIFFERENCE Guide to Setting up an Eco Event Included (Insert) BPI Certified tableware under the appropriate conditions will turn into nutrient-rich soil in an industrial or composting facility in 2 - 4 months, not 100 years like single-use plastic! In addition, BPI certified flatware (made of CPLA) takes 65% less energy to make and produces 68% fewer greenhouse gases than conventional plastics. Look for environmentally conscious utensils certified by BPI (Certificate #10528852 Issued 2018) meeting high standards (ASTM D6400). Eco Tested | 100% BPI Certified All Natural and Safe Large Sturdy Utensils With High Heat Resistance Convenient Tray Included Guide to Setting Up Eco Event Included (See Insert)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars commercially compostable, you are going to be breaking it down in you compost heap.
reviews.reviewText: very nice product, sturdy, and knifes actually cut.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love using these knifes. I keep a few in the car and in my purse so I can use them when I eat out. Nice to throw them in the recycle knowing they are not going to hurt the environment. They are heavy and a nice size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and well packaged
reviews.reviewText: As durable as standard plasticware, though they can deform a little when used enthusiastically in particularly hot food. Comfortable handle. Box is sturdy cardboard with a nice slide-out drawer. Sharp teeth cut through things easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pleased with purchase
reviews.reviewText: Bought these for holiday partyGood value, easy to holdPhoto was accurate

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Very durable. I am quite pleased with how strong they are and it makes it even better that it is helping our planet a little bit too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great knife, but not as Earth friendly as advertised
reviews.reviewText: These knife are excellent and sturdy, my 4 star rating was due to the somewhat misleading “100% compostable” label. I was willing to pay a little more to ensure my knifes wouldn’t end up polluting the environment. When received and inspected there is a label that says “compostable in industrial facilities. Check locally, as these do not exist in many communities. Not suitable for backyard composting.” So if you are buying these to be earth friendly, maybe look elsewhere or confirm these facilities exist in your area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: These knives come in a sturdy box and I can slide the shelf out and grab one and easily package it all back up. Plus, they are compostable. I will be buying again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Eco Friendly Alternative to Plastic
reviews.reviewText: This line of compostable forks, spoons and knives are great! They are strong and durable. It is a fabulous alternative to plastic!
